p: Surfactantless Emulsions Containing Eugenol for Imidacloprid Solubilization: Physicochemical Characterization and Toxicity against Insecticide-Resistant Cimex lectularius by Mariano Cáceres, Eduardo Guzmán, Agustín Alvarez-Costa, Francisco Ortega, Ramón G. Rubio, Carlos Coviella, Pablo L. Santo Orihuela, Claudia V. Vassena and Alejandro Lucia Molecules 2020, 25(10), 2290; https://doi.org/10.3390/molecules25102290
